preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure each ingredient using a precise scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine Calcium (60 g), Germanium (32 g), Lithium (6.9 g), Silicon (42 g), and Samarium (7.6 g). 
 3. Mix thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer for 10 minutes to ensure uniform distribution.
